extendedInfo.description: Jango Radio is a free, personalized radio service that plays the best music by artists you love. Just start with the name of one of your favorite artists, and Jango will create a custom station that plays similar music. Or you can tune in to hundreds of expertly programmed genre stations like Top 100, Hot in Hip-Hop, Indie Dance Hits & moreâ¦ All with just one ad per day and unlimited free listening.Already a Jango listener? Great! Just log in to access your existing stations, and create new ones right from your mobile device.--------------------------------------"I'm in love with Jango" - USA Today"Straightforward and easy to navigate" - Wall Street Journal"Refreshingly simple online radio" - CNet"Makes it fun to discover new music" - PC World--------------------------------------Jango Radio Features:- Free, unlimited listening on desktop and mobile- Create custom radio stations with the artists you love- Tune in to 100's of expertly curated stations in dozens of genres, from dance and country to holiday music and hits by decade- Fine-tune your stations by adding or banning artists- Share stations with your friends on Facebook- Listen as much as you want at low, medium or high quality- Save stations to listen again on your device or at www.jango.com- Available for any device running Android 2.1 or newer

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Better than Pandora. I love this app. I had it on my computer and loved it so it\'s nice that I can now take my custom radio with me with very few commercials.
reviews.author: Loretta McCranie

reviews.title: I love it, but...
reviews.comment: So much potential to be the dominant music app. I\'m hoping for an update soon and it\'ll easily get 5 stars. As of June 23, I am not able to sign in on LTE/CDMA, but Wi-Fi works perfectly. Anybody else having this issue?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Getting better.
reviews.comment: Need to fix volume equalization between older and newer songs, hate having to turn it up to hear a good song then next one blasts you away. A lot better variety than Pandora, wich basicall caters to full Americans, and other popular languages. Also need to work on constant freezing and,or closing throught the day. Very annoying. Keep improving and I\'ll keep giving you more stars.
reviews.author: AL SKI

reviews.title: THE BEST!!!!
reviews.comment: I totally love this! Way better than Pandora! But I would like more and different songs. Other than that I\'m in love with this app! Love you jango!<3
reviews.author: Kim Erika

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Love this app, so speedy and easy to use. Great music whatever your mood. Thank you!
reviews.author: Rosemary Lincoln

reviews.title: Wonderful!
reviews.comment: After some... episodes with Pandora, I was left to my own devices. Jango is amazing. I recommend it to anyone who needs a good, free radio.
reviews.author: Eve Miller

reviews.title: Best out of the best
reviews.comment: Tried all the popular ones this is the best . You can search your tunes or choose from many different lists. Also unlimited skips and one advertisement per 24 hours. This is awsome for freeeee
reviews.author: John Murphy

reviews.comment: I love this app!  Great features, excellent learning program to adapt to your preference.  Only problem is an occasional freezing. Awesome app! One of my favorites!
reviews.author: Jacob Schneider

reviews.title: Great...but songs repeat quite quickly!
reviews.comment: I really like the app! Especially while in Korea...BC Pandora didn\'t work here...but the songs seem to loop... heard the same songs on the same stations like 10 times in 3 days!
reviews.author: Breanna Mason

reviews.title: Need to be able to create as many stations as you want. Major flaw!!
reviews.comment: Also if you give a song a thumbs down it states \"will NEVER play this song again\" and it does anyways.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sweet app :)
reviews.comment: Jango is a refreshing switch from Pandora. Only one add per day, no pop-up adds, and many track skips allowed. Lovin\' it!
reviews.author: Savannah Hill

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I love this app, it\'s way better than Pandorisone of the other music players. Not to many interruptions and it hasn\'t crashed on me yet! I highly recommend if you like music!
reviews.author: raquel zamora

reviews.title: Boooo
reviews.comment: Crashes like crazy. Un installed ..... unless issue gets solved
reviews.author: Pips B

reviews.title: Battery consumption +!
reviews.comment: Why can\'t I go back and see previous tracks...I can\'t always get to my phone at work and I want to thumbs up some. Pandora you can go all the way back and see what had played.... Would like to see this option and definitely 5 stars. Great app. Very easy on the battery!! End of the day I\'m at 50%. Pandora usually 15-20%
reviews.author: Jason Hancock

reviews.title: Great free music app
reviews.comment: Excellent alternative to the others paid services. Easy to use. Also, like the independent artist vote.
reviews.author: Edwin Planas

reviews.title: First rating on any app
reviews.comment: This is my first rating for an app and Jango is the best Internet Radio out there. High quality option really gets me high quality. Not like TuneIn and best of all it is available in my country. Not like Pandora. If I could leave 10 starts I would believe me. This has become a must have app for me..
reviews.author: Daniel Gal\303\241n

reviews.title: Best yet
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried so many online radios, and this is by far the the best \342\231\245 I love how you can change songs as many times as you desire! Amazing. Thank you!
reviews.author: Brittany Ruiz-mabe

reviews.title: Not on RAZR i
reviews.comment: Shame it does not work on my current phone  From my old phone I know this is a good app  Will re-score highly when fixed to work on Motorola RAZR i.
reviews.author: Richard Robinson

reviews.title: Ok but need improvement...
reviews.comment: Improvement like an undo button, lyrics display and OH GOD more album version. I\'m really not a fan of live performance. I don\'t need to ear people screaming over the song I\'m about to listen.
reviews.author: Mathieu Dancause

reviews.title: Repetion...
reviews.comment: If you choose a predeposed station it just plays the same 10 songs... creating your own station is tedious (sp?) This app could be so much better... I wish 8trackes worked better via phone =/
reviews.author: Rebecca Bennett
